title: GANGPLANK POOL PARTY SKIN

Im really happy with the gp skin so much
its an insta buy for me but now i have to learn to play gp and i dont like top lane :/
mostly support but ive been in a slump so i just practice wat ever lane in norms i might take him mid lane
GP is fun, couse you can play him wherever the fuck you want. Toplank, midplank, adplank, supplank
